profiles:
Summary I love making an impact, especially with marketing. I think it’s one of the most difficult and one of most exciting jobs in any company.  
 
At some level though, I am also passionately trying to prove the adage 'All Marketers Are Liars'​ is passé and false. In the process, I try to evangelize marketing in every form to help fellow marketers. 
 
Some Questions I am answering: 
Can you marry agile marketing with traditional marketing? 
Can you look beyond persona-, touchpoint-, last-click attribution approaches to maximize ROI? 
Can product and marketing merge to redefine individual KRAs and exceed individual KPIs? 
 
What drives me? 
Ideating for product improvements that makes life easy - for the end client. 
Continuous learning to be in the competition. Sharing the knowledge to increase the learnings. 
Managing (including remote locations) a team of vibrant and energetic marketers and strategists to channel their energies in attaining team's objectives and key results. 
 
Specialties: Ideating, Persona Based Marketing, Digital Marketing Management, Agile Marketing, Leadership, Blogging, Social Media Strategist, eCommerce. November 2013  – Present (1 year 9 months) Bangalore My tools for hacking growth: 
Smart team of marketers. 
Insanely optimizable and scalable channels. 
Testing, re-testing, reworking, measuring and more testing.  
Boils down to how I play around with numbers. 
A great leadership team that keeps me on my toes (literally and everyday). 
 
Branding: 
Working closely with the branding agencies (W + K & Brewhouse) for building a consistent tone and voice for the brand. 
Part of the Creative Council that includes the entire leadership and EMG group to build out a crystallized content and communication strategy. 
Built and closely monitor all the touchpoints with the customer to ensure that the positioning and tonality is consistent. 
 
CRM: 
Redefining Customer Relationship Management to Customer Experience Management. 
Spearheading 'Customer Delight'​ project to ensure that we deliver a 'wow' experience. 
Closely work on the repeat and retention strategy and trying to move it upwards (currently at 34%). 
Hiring the cream and empowering them to be customer guardians. 
Playing the bad cop with the internal teams to ensure that the end user leaves with a smile on his/her face. View Head Digital Marketing babyoye.com April 2011  –  June 2012  (1 year 3 months) Mumbai Area, India Sensible Marketing is how I define my efforts as a Head of Digital Marketing. From strategy to execution, from media planning to buying, from affiliates to strategic partnerships and alliances, the focus was always to drive value to the last cent. 
 
Marketing that encompassed building a brand for a start up and ensuring that it was perceived the right way. Every touch point with our prospects, be it from engagements on facebook to mailer sent to our registered base, the effort was to bring a value add.

website traffic growth with focus on conversions and bounce rates

View Business Evangelist Raahithi INC. January 2009  –  October 2010  (1 year 10 months) Its difficult to describe your role clearly when you are one of the founding members. From office boy to key decision maker, you need to jot down all the responsibilities here. I will save you from reading all that. In a nutshell, this is what I do: 
~ Get Business 
~ Get IT done 
~ Get the Feedback 
~ Get IT Implemented 
~ Get the client back  
 
That's the little ecosystem around my role. Keeps me charged up and allows me to have a satisfied sleep at the end of the day. View Online Sales Manager Monster July 2008  –  January 2009  (7 months) As an Online Sales Manager for Middle East, I ideate to increase volume via the eCom channel. Propped up by the Marketing and Technology teams in creating new product mix, promotional initiatives, our efforts continue to look at making the eCom channel more effective than the traditional sales channels.  
 
While continous learning and experimentation is the prime reason for survival, I work closely with other functions for constant feedback and improvements. Empowering the team to take decisions and leading them in the right direction to make them more productive and to have a satisfying career with our company is sacrosanct of the role.  
 
Demand generation through the online channel for Middle East and India. 
Sales reports and forecasts for determining sales targets
